abstracts.cdata!:
This paper seeks to extend the closing
            date for the Governance Technical Assistance Project (GTAC)
            from December 28, 2012 until December 31, 2013. This will be
            the third extension for a cumulative period of five years.
            This time is required to finalize implementation of key
            project activities and to allow for full achievement of the
            project's development objectives: to improve
            transparency and support modernization of the Treasury.
            Although the project is in its ninth year, it has been
            impacted by two primary causes: 1) Kyrgyzstan has undergone
            two significant political upheavals causing complete changes
            in government; and 2) as a result of the political
            instability, tendering documents for a major component of
            the project, the acquisition and implementation of an
            integrated financial management information system (FMIS),
            were significantly delayed.
